Description:
Detects changes to the bitbucket audit log configuration.

Author: Muhammad Faisal (@faisalusuf)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Bitbucket Audit Log Configuration Updated
Query: sourcetype="bitbucket-audit" audittype.category="Auditing" audittype.action="Audit log configuration updated"
